trackCensoredName: LeKiosk - The best experience to discover and read magazines
trackName: LeKiosk - The best experience to discover and read magazines
releaseNotes:
New: your library becomes smarter! 
You can now: 
- Delete a magazine 
- Archive a magazine 
- Ensure that a magazine has been read 

Other new features in this version: 
- Your reader becomes more intuitive maintaining your zoom level 
- New recommendation pages in the Newsstand
- Minor bugs fixed
- iOS 8 ready !

LeKiosk has been completely redesigned to bring you a sleek new, updated look with a personalised interface, custom recommendations, a more powerful search engine, and an HD reader! 

Discover the new LeKiosk experience today! 

Now you can connect directly to your magazines and comics, and discover our custom recommendations for all your interests. But that’s not all! Hurry and download or update the app today to explore all these new features.
